fields.value: Replication Data for: Patterns of seasonality and group membership characterize the gut microbiota in a longitudinal study of wild Verreaux’s sifakas  (Propithecus verreauxi)

dsDescriptionValue.value: This dataset contains the sample metadata and OTU tables necessary to reproduce the analyses presented in "Patterns of seasonality and group membership characterize the gut microbiota in a longitudinal study of wild Verreaux’s sifakas  (Propithecus verreauxi)". Note that sequences have been deposited in the European Bioinformatics Institute database (Study accession: PRJEB20740).

files.description: Table containing mean values for dietary diversity, food item intake and nutrient intake for the study months March, April, May, August, September, October.
files.label: Mean_monthly_diet.tab

dataFile.description: Table containing mean values for dietary diversity, food item intake and nutrient intake for the study months March, April, May, August, September, October.

files.description: OTU table with taxonomy, created by picking OTUs against the 97% Greengenes (V13.8) representative sequence database with a 94% similarity threshold. This dataset was rarefied to 2000 reads/sample and used for genus-level analysis.
files.label: otu_table94_even2000_L6_json

dataFile.description: OTU table with taxonomy, created by picking OTUs against the 97% Greengenes (V13.8) representative sequence database with a 94% similarity threshold. This dataset was rarefied to 2000 reads/sample and used for genus-level analysis.

files.description: OTU table with taxonomy. OTUs were picked closed-reference using the NINJA-OPS classifier with an 87% similarity threshold against the Greengenes 94% representative sequence database. Data was rarefied to 8000 reads / sample.
files.label: otu_table_mc2_w_tax_NINJA8000json

dataFile.description: OTU table with taxonomy. OTUs were picked closed-reference using the NINJA-OPS classifier with an 87% similarity threshold against the Greengenes 94% representative sequence database. Data was rarefied to 8000 reads / sample.

files.description: Table containing sample metadata: Date/time/month/season of sampling, animal ID, animal group membership, animal age, animal sex, reproductive status and read depth
files.label: Sample Metadata.tab

dataFile.description: Table containing sample metadata: Date/time/month/season of sampling, animal ID, animal group membership, animal age, animal sex, reproductive status and read depth
